description: This file contains unit tests for the TriState class, which is likely a part of the core library. It uses Google Test framework to verify the behavior of TriState object creation and state setting.

classes.name: TriState
classes.description: A class representing a three-state boolean logic (True, False, Unknown).

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Returns the current state of the TriState object.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets the state of the TriState object to True, False, or Unknown.
